root.name: The Great Gonzo in WordRider
root.description: PlotIn this game, Camila the Chicken, Gonzo's girlfriend, is invited to dinner with the Swedish Chef. Gonzo soon realizes that he is going to cook her. Then Gonzo gos to Dr. Honeydew, who gives him words Gonzo can use to build machines.LocationsYellowyolk National ParkCickagoCarlsbird CavernsHen-a-layen Mountains
